variable.value: NONE OR DRANK BEER LESS THAN ONE PER WEEK

variable.description: BEER: AVERAGE NUMBER OF BEER (12 OZ. BOTTLE, GLASS, CAN). WHAT IS YOUR AVERAGE NUMBER OF SERVINGS IN A TYPICAL MONTH SINCE YOUR LAST EXAM

variable.description: WHITE WINE: AVERAGE NUMBER OF WHITE WINE (4 OZ GLASS). WHAT IS YOUR AVERAGE NUMBER OF SERVINGS IN A TYPICAL MONTH SINCE YOUR LAST EXAM

variable.name: FU046
variable.description: LIQUOR/SPIRITS: AVERAGE NUMBER OF LIQUOR/SPIRITS (1 OZ COCKTAIL/HIGHBALL). WHAT IS YOUR AVERAGE NUMBER OF SERVINGS IN A TYPICAL WEEK SINCE YOUR LAST EXAM

variable.name: FU047
variable.description: LIQUOR/SPIRITS: AVERAGE NUMBER OF LIQUOR/SPIRITS (1 OZ COCKTAIL/HIGHBALL). WHAT IS YOUR AVERAGE NUMBER OF SERVINGS IN A TYPICAL MONTH SINCE YOUR LAST EXAM

variable.description: CAN YOU WALK 50 FEET WITHOUT HELP?
variable.value: ABLE TO WALK 50 FEET WITHOUT HELP

variable.name: FU136
variable.description: IF WALKING ON LEVEL GROUND, HOW MANY CITY BLOCKS UNTIL SYMPTOMS DEVELOP? (WHERE 10 BLOCKS = 1 MILE, CODE AS NO IF MORE THAN 98 BLOCKS REQUIRED TO DEVELOP SYMPTOMS)
variable.value: NO SYMPTOMS OR ZERO BLOCKS UNTIL SYMPTOMS DEVELOP

variable.name: FU361

SOME OR A LITTLE OF TIME (1-2 DAYS)
OCCASIONALLY OR MODERATE AMOUNT OF TIME (3-4 DAYS)
MOST OR ALL OF THE TIME (5-7 DAYS)

YES, AT LEAST 3 MONTHS PER YEAR

variable.name: FU392
variable.description: IN GENERAL, HOW IS YOUR HEALTH NOW? (PROXY MAY NOT BE USED TO HELP COMPLETE THIS SECTION)

variable.name: FU393
variable.description: COMPARE YOUR HEALTH TO MOST PEOPLE YOUR OWN AGE (PROXY MAY NOT BE USED TO HELP COMPLETE THIS SECTION)
variable.value: WORSE THAN MOST PEOPLE YOUR OWN AGE

variable.name: FU395
variable.description: DURING THE COURSE OF A NORMAL DAY, CAN YOU DO THE FOLLOWING ACTIVITIES INDEPENDENTLY OR DO YOU NEED HUMAN ASSISTANCE OR THE USE OF A DEVICE? --DRESSING (UNDRESSING AND REDRESSING)
variable.value: DO NOT DO DURING A NORMAL DAY

variable.name: FU396
variable.description: DURING THE COURSE OF A NORMAL DAY, CAN YOU DO THE FOLLOWING ACTIVITIES INDEPENDENTLY OR DO YOU NEED HUMAN ASSISTANCE OR THE USE OF A DEVICE? --BATHING (INCLUDING GETTING IN AND OUT OF THE TUB OR SHOWER. DEVICE SUCH AS: BATH CHAIR, LONG HANDLED SPONGE, HANDLE HELD SHOWER, SAFETY BARS)
variable.value: DO NOT DO DURING A NORMAL DAY

variable.name: FU397
variable.description: DURING THE COURSE OF A NORMAL DAY, CAN YOU DO THE FOLLOWING ACTIVITIES INDEPENDENTLY OR DO YOU NEED HUMAN ASSISTANCE OR THE USE OF A DEVICE? --EATING
variable.value: DO NOT DO DURING A NORMAL DAY

variable.name: FU398
variable.description: DURING THE COURSE OF A NORMAL DAY, CAN YOU DO THE FOLLOWING ACTIVITIES INDEPENDENTLY OR DO YOU NEED HUMAN ASSISTANCE OR THE USE OF A DEVICE? --TRANSFERRING (GETTING IN AND OUT OF A CHAIR. DEVICE SUCH AS: SLIDING BOARD, GRAB BARS SPECIAL SEAT)
variable.value: DO NOT DO DURING A NORMAL DAY

variable.name: FU399
variable.description: DURING THE COURSE OF A NORMAL DAY, CAN YOU DO THE FOLLOWING ACTIVITIES INDEPENDENTLY OR DO YOU NEED HUMAN ASSISTANCE OR THE USE OF A DEVICE? --TOILETING ACTIVITIES (USING BATHROOM FACILITIES AND HANDLE CLOTHING. DEVICE SUCH AS: SPECIAL TOILED SEAT,COMMODE)
variable.value: DO NOT DO DURING A NORMAL DAY

variable.name: FU400
variable.description: DURING THE COURSE OF A NORMAL DAY, CAN YOU DO THE FOLLOWING ACTIVITIES INDEPENDENTLY OR DO YOU NEED HUMAN ASSISTANCE OR THE USE OF A DEVICE? --BLADDER CONTINENCE (ASK IF PERSON HAS "ACCIDENTS". DEVICE SUCH AS: EXTERNAL CATHETER, DRAINAGE BAGS, ILEAL APPLIANCE, PROTECTIVE DEVICES)
variable.value: DO NOT DO DURING A NORMAL DAY

variable.name: FU401
variable.description: DURING THE COURSE OF A NORMAL DAY, CAN YOU DO THE FOLLOWING ACTIVITIES INDEPENDENTLY OR DO YOU NEED HUMAN ASSISTANCE OR THE USE OF A DEVICE? --BOWEL CONTINENCE (ASK IF PERSON HAS "ACCIDENTS". DEVICE SUCH AS: SUPPOSITORIES, BEDPAN, REGULAR ENEMAS, COLOSTOMY)
variable.value: DO NOT DO DURING A NORMAL DAY

variable.name: FU402
variable.description: DURING THE COURSE OF A NORMAL DAY, CAN YOU DO THE FOLLOWING ACTIVITIES INDEPENDENTLY OR DO YOU NEED HUMAN ASSISTANCE OR THE USE OF A DEVICE? --WALKING ON LEVEL SURFACE ABOUT 50 YARDS (DEVICE SUCH AS: CANE, CRUTCHES, OR WALKER)
variable.value: DO NOT DO DURING A NORMAL DAY

variable.name: FU403
variable.description: DURING THE COURSE OF A NORMAL DAY, CAN YOU DO THE FOLLOWING ACTIVITIES INDEPENDENTLY OR DO YOU NEED HUMAN ASSISTANCE OR THE USE OF A DEVICE? --WALKING UP AND DOWN ONE FLIGHT STAIRS (DEVICE SUCH AS: HANDRAIL,CANE)
variable.value: DO NOT DO DURING A NORMAL DAY

variable.name: FU404
variable.description: DURING THE COURSE OF A NORMAL DAY, CAN YOU DO THE FOLLOWING ACTIVITIES INDEPENDENTLY OR DO YOU NEED HUMAN ASSISTANCE OR THE USE OF A DEVICE? --USING A TELEPHONE (DEVICE SUCH AS LARGE NUMBERS, VOICE ACTIVATION, AMPLIFICATION)
variable.value: DO NOT DO DURING A NORMAL DAY

variable.name: FU405
variable.description: DURING THE COURSE OF A NORMAL DAY, CAN YOU DO THE FOLLOWING ACTIVITIES INDEPENDENTLY OR DO YOU NEED HUMAN ASSISTANCE OR THE USE OF A DEVICE? --PREPARING AND TAKING OWN MEDICATIONS
variable.value: DO NOT DO DURING A NORMAL DAY

variable.description: ARE YOU IN BED OR IN A CHAIR FOR MOST OR ALL OF THE DAY (ON THE AVERAGE?)

variable.description: DO YOU NEED A SPECIAL AID (WHEELCHAIR, CANE, WALKER) TO GET AROUND?

variable.description: IF YES TO FU438, WHICH EQUIPMENT DO YOU USE: --CANE OR WALKING STICK

variable.description: IF YES TO FU438, WHICH EQUIPMENT DO YOU USE: --WHEELCHAIR

variable.description: IF YES TO FU438, WHICH EQUIPMENT DO YOU USE: --WALKER

variable.name: FU442
variable.description: IF YES TO FU438, WHICH EQUIPMENT DO YOU USE: --OTHER

variable.name: FU443
variable.description: ROSOW-BRESLAU QUESTIONS: ARE YOU ABLE TO DO HEAVY WORK AROUND THE HOUSE, LIKE SHOVELING SNOW OR WASHING WINDOWS, WALLS OR FLOORS WITHOUT HELP?

variable.description: ROSOW-BRESLAU: ARE YOU ABLE TO WALK HALF A MILE WITHOUT HELP? (ABOUT 4 - 6 BLOCKS)

variable.name: FU445
variable.description: ROSOW-BRESLAU: IF YOU HAD TO, COULD YOU DO ALL THE HOUSEKEEPING YOURSELF? (LIKE WASHING THE CLOTHES AND CLEANING)

variable.description: ROSOW-BRESLAU: IF YOU HAD TO, COULD YOU DO ALL THE COOKING YOURSELF?

variable.name: FU449

variable.name: FU451
variable.description: NAGI: PULLING OR PUSHING LARGE OBJECTS LIKE A LIVING ROOM CHAIR
variable.value: DON'T DO ON MD ORDERS OR INSTITUTIONAL ORDERS
UNABLE TO ASSESS DIFICULTY BECAUSE NOT DONE AS PART OF DAILY ACTIVITIES

variable.name: FU452
variable.description: NAGI: EITHER STOOPING, CROUCHING, OR KNEELING
variable.value: DON'T DO ON MD ORDERS OR INSTITUTIONAL ORDERS
UNABLE TO ASSESS DIFICULTY BECAUSE NOT DONE AS PART OF DAILY ACTIVITIES

variable.description: NAGI: REACHING OR EXTENDING ARMS BELOW SHOULDER LEVEL
variable.value: DON'T DO ON MD ORDERS OR INSTITUTIONAL ORDERS
UNABLE TO ASSESS DIFICULTY BECAUSE NOT DONE AS PART OF DAILY ACTIVITIES

UNABLE TO ASSESS DIFICULTY BECAUSE NOT DONE AS PART OF DAILY ACTIVITIES

variable.name: FU486
variable.description: BERKMAN: HOW MANY CLOSE FRIENDS DO YOU HAVE: PEOPLE THAT YOU FEEL AT EASE WITH, CAN TALK TO ABOUT PRIVATE MATTERS?

variable.name: FU487
variable.description: BERKMAN: HOW MANY OF THESE CLOSE FRIENDS DO YOU SEE AT LEAST ONCE A MONTH?

variable.name: FU488
variable.description: BERKMAN: HOW MANY RELATIVES DO YOU HAVE, PEOPLE THAT YOU FEEL AT EASE WITH, CAN TALK TO ABOUT PRIVATE MATTERS?

variable.name: FU489
variable.description: BERKMAN: HOW MANY OF THESE RELATIVES DO YOU SEE AT LEAST ONCE A MONTH?

variable.name: FU490
variable.description: BERKMAN: DO YOU PARTICIPATE IN ANY GROUPS SUCH AS A SENIOR CENTER, SOCIAL OR WORK GROUP, RELIGIOUS CONNECTED GROUP, SELF-HELP GROUP, OR CHARITY, PUBLIC SERVICE OR COMMUNITY GROUP?

variable.name: FU491
variable.description: BERKMAN: ABOUT HOW OFTEN DO YOU GO TO RELIGIOUS MEETINGS OR SERVICES?

variable.name: FU492
variable.description: BERKMAN: DO YOU HAVE MEDICARE OR MEDICAID?

variable.name: FU493
variable.description: BERKMAN: IS THERE SOMEONE AVAILABLE TO YOU WHOM YOU CAN COUNT ON TO LISTEN TO YOU WHEN YOU NEED TO TALK?

variable.name: FU494
variable.description: BERKMAN: IS THERE SOMEONE AVAILABLE TO GIVE YOU GOOD ADVICE ABOUT A PROBLEM?

variable.name: FU495
variable.description: BERKMAN: IS THERE SOMEONE AVAILABLE TO YOU WHO SHOWS YOU LOVE AND AFFECTION?

variable.name: FU496
variable.description: BERKMAN: CAN YOU COUNT ON ANYONE TO PROVIDE YOU WITH EMOTIONAL SUPPORT (TALKING OVER PROBLEMS OR HELPING YOU MAKE A DIFFICULT DECISION)?

variable.name: FU497
variable.description: BERKMAN: DO YOU HAVE AS MUCH CONTACT AS YOU WOULD LIKE WITH SOMEONE YOU FEEL CLOSE TO, SOMEONE IN WHOM YOU CAN TRUST AND CONFIDE?

variable.name: FU499
variable.description: DURING THE PAST YEAR, HOW OFTEN HAVE YOU PARTICIPATED IN THE FOLLOWING LEISURE TIME ACTIVITIES? --READING BOOKS/NEWSPAPERS
variable.value: SEVERAL DAYS PER WEEK (2-6 DAYS PER WEEK)

variable.name: FU500
